mapper.sql: token AS "token" , user_id AS "userId" , mobile_number AS "mobileNumber" , user_code AS "userCode" , login_ip AS "loginIp" , login_type AS "loginType" , login_date AS "loginDate" , last_access_date AS "lastAccessDate" , token有效时间 AS "token有效时间" , token失效日期 AS "token失效日期" , imei AS "imei" , operating_system AS "operatingSystem" , operating_system_version AS "operatingSystemVersion" , device_brand AS "deviceBrand" , device_model AS "deviceModel" , user_agent AS "userAgent" , create_date AS "createDate" , update_date AS "updateDate" , delete_date AS "deleteDate"

trim.if: AND token有效时间 = #{token有效时间}
AND token失效日期 = #{token失效日期}

sql.set: token = #{token}, user_id = #{userId}, mobile_number = #{mobileNumber}, user_code = #{userCode}, login_ip = #{loginIp}, login_type = #{loginType}, login_date = #{loginDate}, last_access_date = #{lastAccessDate}, token有效时间 = #{token有效时间}, token失效日期 = #{token失效日期}, imei = #{imei}, operating_system = #{operatingSystem}, operating_system_version = #{operatingSystemVersion}, device_brand = #{deviceBrand}, device_model = #{deviceModel}, user_agent = #{userAgent}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, delete_date = #{deleteDate},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_usr_login ( token, user_id, mobile_number, user_code, login_ip, login_type, login_date, last_access_date, token有效时间, token失效日期, imei, operating_system, operating_system_version, device_brand, device_model, user_agent, create_date, update_date, delete_date ) VALUES ( #{token}, #{userId}, #{mobileNumber}, #{userCode}, #{loginIp}, #{loginType}, #{loginDate}, #{lastAccessDate}, #{token有效时间}, #{token失效日期}, #{imei}, #{operatingSystem}, #{operatingSystemVersion}, #{deviceBrand}, #{deviceModel}, #{userAgent}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteDate} )
